beta_warn: Don’t store all your money in Marskit.
qr_error_text: Sorry. Marskit is not able to read this QR code.
qr_error_no_data_text: Unable to read or interpret the provided data.
qr_error_network_text: Marskit is currently set to {{selectedNetwork}} but data is for {{dataNetwork}}.
buy_text: Don’t have Marscoin yet to send to your Marskit wallet? Stack some sats.
connection_lost_message: Please check your Electrum Server settings.
connection_reconnect_msg: Lost connection to server, trying to reconnect...
up_text: There is a critical update available for Marskit. You must update to continue using Marskit.
camera_ask_msg: Marskit needs permission to use your camera
camera_no_text:
<bold>It appears Marskit does not have permission to access your camera.</bold>

To utilize this feature in the future you will need to enable camera permissions for this app from your phones settings.
scan_redirect_msg: Marskit redirected you to the relevant screen.
rate_error_msg_date:
Could not get exchange rate. Using price from
{{date}}
rate_error_msg_nodate: Could not get exchange rate. Please try again later.
lnurl_ln_error_msg: Unable to startup local lightning node at this time. Please try again or restart the app.
lnurl_blocktank_error: Unable to connect to Blocktank server.
lnurl_withdr_error_no_capacity: Not enough inbound/receiving capacity to complete lnurl-withdraw request.
lnurl_withdr_error_create_invoice: Unable to successfully create invoice for lnurl-withdraw.
lnurl_withdr_error_connect: Unable to connect to LNURL withdraw server.
update_text: Please update Marskit to the latest version for new features and bug fixes!
high_text2: For safety reasons, we recommend moving some of your savings to an offline cold wallet or multisig solution.
high_text2_beta: Please consider moving some of your funds. We recommend using only small amounts while Marskit is in beta.
caution_text: Beta software may put your money at risk. We recommend using only small amounts (like $10) while Marskit is in beta.
